metadata.title: CVE-2020-6582 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Nagios NRPE 3.2.1 has a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow, as demonstrated byinterpretation of a small negative number as a large positive number duringa bzero call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6582` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nagios-nrpe-plugin - 4.0.0-2ubuntu1
nagios-nrpe-server - 4.0.0-2ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nagios-nrpe package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.0-2ubuntu1').
